update his_emr
IDENTITY_ID = #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPECIALIST_ID = #{specialistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOSPITAL = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THERAPY_TIME = #{therapyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGE = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OCCUP = #{occup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRUG_ALLERGY_HISTORY = #{drugAllergyHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYMPTOM = #{symptom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRESENT_ILLNESS_HISTORY = #{presentIllnessHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIVIOUS_ILLNESS_HISTORY = #{priviousIllnessHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

VALIDITY = #{validity,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where EMR_ID = #{emrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
